title: Willie Colón, a Luminary of Salsa Music, Dies at 75

title: Handmade patchwork quilts bring comfort to Taree palliative care patients and their families
desc: Over a decade, more than 2,000 quilts have been made for palliative care patients in Taree. The powerful gesture brings dignity and comfort, and a tangible memory for families.

title: Rescuers recover final body after California avalanche
desc: Rescuers in California have recovered the body of the ninth and final person missing in an avalanche in the Sierra Nevada mountains, the local sheriff's office said.
